Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I have not found GenAI to be helpful in providing feedback, whereas I have found teachers to be very helpful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The GenAI feedback frustrated me as it was irrelevant, however the feedback from the teacher made me consider my work and I agreed with them.
